articles.title: Bungie accidentally turns on Destiny 2 crossplay months early - The Verge
articles.description: Some Destiny 2 players have been able to play with people on other platforms after Bungie inadvertently switched the feature on. The developer says crossplay will be removed later this week, though it’s scheduled for an official release in the fall.
articles.content:
Itll be removed later this week
